com.atc.simulator.display

Class CameraBatch

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      • java.util.HashMap<DisplayRenderableProvider,RenderableProvider>
        • com.atc.simulator.display.CameraBatch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<DisplayRenderableProvider,RenderableProvider>

    public class CameraBatch
extends java.util.HashMap<DisplayRenderableProvider,RenderableProvider>
    Represents a collection of renderable providers to be rendered with the same camera.
    See Also:
